top_comments.comment: Uhh HELLO!!?? Duh!!! This idea totally came about in Breaking Bad!! I'm sure this has been going on for a LONG time!
Excuse to watch breaking bad again.

comments_since_last_sample.body: This looks like an inside job

At some point common sense has to kick in. I wouldn't trust leaving valuables in a jewelry box out in the open like that. She could have put that entire jewelry box in that big expensive handbag  rather than leave it behind like that. I am sorry it happened nonetheless, it is sad that thieves can't be trusted to leave your stuff alone while you leave your home unsecured. The company should have done a better job of warning the homeowner to lock up valuables regardless or offer the service of security for an extra charge or something. 😟
it was probably one of the workers .
Set one up with poison so the thieves can die 😎
The meth in that city is probably the purest people have seen
You can literally bait these thieves if you wanted to lol
